title: Title: The text on the page [Compliance and Legals] is displayed in bold and underlined when switching to AR
s2: 2. Hover the cursor over Menu section [More]
s3: 3. Click on the Menu item [Compliance and Legals]
expected: Expected Result: The text in the paragraphs on the page [Compliance and Legals] has the same font when switching to AR The text is wrapped in (p)
actual: Actual Result: The text on the page [Compliance and Legals] is in bold and underlined when switching to AR The text is wrapped in (u> and (strong)
